about_the_game:
The tale continues beyond the shadows of Tudor Mansion and into the dazzling sunlight of the Black Adder Resort!

Mr Callan Coral, the manager of the Black Adder Resort and former business partner of Mr Boden “Boddy” Black, has invited everyone suspected of his business associate’s murder to lie low on his exclusive tropical island. Eager to get away from prying eyes in the aftermath of the party, everyone accepts the offer. However, things take a turn for the worse when they once again find themselves at the heart of another murder mystery!

Shortly after revealing his plans to his guests, Callan Coral is found dead in the hotel lobby…

This bundle also includes THE BLACK ADDER RESORT: REVISITED, which introduces two new suspects into the mix – Agent Gray and Analyst Hyacinth! 

INCLUDES:

  • A BRAND-NEW CRIME SCENE – Explore the luxurious private holiday destination for the rich and famous in the Black Adder Resort!

  • THE BLACK ADDER RESORT: REVISITED – Think you cracked the case? Think again! Return to the Black Adder Resort and interrogate two new suspects who have murky ties to Mr Coral…

  • HOLIDAY THREADS – All six guests dressed for a tropical holiday, not a spot of crime-solving!

  • MORE STORY TO EXPLORE – Unlock more case files with additional character profiles, evidence, motives, interview transcripts and more!

Close another case and boost your detective credentials!
